00056 namespace OpenMesh {
00057 namespace Concepts { 
00058 
00059 
00060 //== CLASS DEFINITION =========================================================
00061               
00062 
00068 struct MeshItems {
00069 
00070 
00078 template <class Refs_> class VertexT
00079 {
00080 public:
00081 
00083   typedef Refs_  Refs;
00084 
00086   VertexT();
00087 
00089   HalfedgeHandle halfedge_handle()  const;
00091   void set_halfedge_handle(HalfedgeHandle _eh);
00092 };
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 
00104 template <class Refs_> class HalfedgeT
00105 {
00106 public:
00107     
00109   typedef Refs_  Refs;
00110 
00113   VertexHandle vertex_handle() const;
00114 
00117   void set_vertex_handle(VertexHandle _vh);
00118 
00121   FaceHandle face_handle()  const;
00122 
00125   void set_face_handle(FaceHandle _fh);
00126     
00129   HalfedgeHandle next_halfedge_handle()  const;
00130 
00133   void set_next_halfedge_handle(HalfedgeHandle _eh);
00134 };
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138 
00146 template <class Refs_> class EdgeT
00147 {
00148 public:
00149 
00151   typedef Refs_  Refs;
00152 
00155   Halfedge  halfedges[2];
00156 };
00157 
00158 
00159 
00160 
00168 template <class Refs_> class FaceT
00169 {
00170 public:
00171 
00173   typedef Refs_  Refs;
00174 
00177   typedef GenProg::TagTrue   IsTriangle;
00179   static bool is_triangle();
00180 
00182   unsigned char n_vertices() const;
00185   void set_n_vertices(unsigned char _n);
00186 
00188   HalfedgeHandle halfedge_handle()  const;
00191   void set_halfedge_handle(HalfedgeHandle _eh);
00192 };
00193 
00194 };
